headline: Should Altria’s (MO) Planned CEO Succession and Steady Dividend Policy Require Action From Investors?
summary: Altria Group has announced that CEO Billy Gifford plans to retire after more than 30 years with the company in May 2026, with current CFO Salvatore Mancuso set to succeed him and long-time executive Heather Newman taking over as CFO on the same date. This carefully staggered leadership transition, paired with a reaffirmed quarterly dividend of US$1.06 per share, highlights Altria’s emphasis on continuity and capital returns during a period of structural change in tobacco markets. We’ll now...
